property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution 0 Trigger - Whenever a creature attacks you. if you have no shields, you may reveal this creature from your hand. if you do, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution light creature, put that creature into the battle zone and put this creature on top of it. Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, this creature gets 'Blocker' and your opponent's Commands can't attack until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Genius Sympathy - Water creatures(This creature costs 10 less to summon for each of your water creatures in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less) World breaker(This creature breaks all your opponent's shields) When you summon this creature, your opponent shuffles all of their creatures into their deck. If they shuffled 6 or more creatures, you win the game.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, if the number of your creatures is equal to or greater than your shields, you may add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 or less shields, each of your light creatures that costs 9 put into your hand from your shields get 'shield trigger'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water creature that costs 5 or more(When one of your water creatures that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures and return it to its owner's hand. If there are 3 or more cards under this creature, choose up to 3 of his creatures and return them to their owner's hand instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you summon this creature into the battle zone, put the top 7 cards of your deck into your graveyard. From among them, use any number of water cards that cost 7 or less for no cost. If you used all 7 cards, you win the game. When this creature leaves the battle zone, shuffle all cards in your graveyard into your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Super Infinite Graveyard evolution - Put this creature into the battle zone on any number of your creatures from your graveyard. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, each of your opponent's creatures gets -5000 power until the end of the turn. When this creature would be destroyed, you may put 3 cards under this creature into your graveyard instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put this creature into the battle zone or attacks, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a darkness creature, destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures and you may put a non-evolution creature that costs less than the destroyed creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution―Put on one of your fire creatures. Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. Put all non-evolution Fire Birds from among them into the battle zone, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 or less shields, each of your other fire creatures get +6000 power and breaks an additional shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your creatures. Invasion - Creature that costs 5 or more (When one of your creatures that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Your cards in the battle zone are considered to be cards of every civilization. Revolution 2 - If you have 2 shields or less, your creatures may cost up to 5 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your nature creatures. Invasion - Nature creature that costs 5 or more(When one of your nature creatures that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. If there are 3 or more cards under this creature, put up to 5 cards from the top of your deck into your mana zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness or fire creatures. S-Rank Invasion 'Lightning Sonic' - Darkness or Fire Command(When one of your darkness or fire commands attack, you may put this creature from your hand, battle zone or graveyard onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts a seal on that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures Invasion - Light creature that costs 5 or more(When one of your light creatures that costs 5 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures and tap it. That creature doesn't untap at the start of your opponent's next turn.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: Each of your water creatures gets the Magic Command race. When this creature would be destroyed during your opponents turn, your opponent draws 5 cards instead, and this creature gets +5000 power until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: World breaker(This creature breaks all your opponent's shields) This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. If you have less than 13 cards in your graveyard, this creature doesn't untap. Whenever this creature untaps, shuffle your graveyard into your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks for the first time each turn, if your number of creatures is equal to or greater than your number of shields, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a fire Dragon, add it to your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck. Mana Arms 5 - When this creature is destroyed, if you have 5 or more fire cards in your mana zone, you may put a fire Dragon that costs 8 or less from your hand into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero - If you have 3 or more Snow Faeries in the battle zone, you may summon this creature for no cost. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return any number of Snow Faeries from your graveyard or mana zone to your hand. Whenever your Snow Faeries would battle one of your opponent's creatures, you may have this creature battle instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, put all nature creatures from your graveyard into your mana zone. During your turn, if a player has 2 or less shields, you may summon a creature from your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Mana Arms 5: If you have 5 or more Light cards in your mana zone, this creature gets 'shield trigger'. Mana Arms 3: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 3 or more Water cards in your mana zone, choose up to 2 of your opponent's creatures. Until the start of your next turn, those creatures can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Mana Arms 5: Whenever this creature attacks, if you have 5 or more Fire cards in your mana zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. That creature and this creature battle. Mana Arms 3: If you have 3 or more Nature cards in your mana zone, this creature gets +5000 power and 'triple breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Ultra Saver: Creature that costs 9(When one of your creatures that costs 9 would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {BLOCKER} This creature can't attack players. When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may return a spell from your mana zone or graveyard to your hand. When this creature would be destroyed, put it on the top of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gravity Zero―If you have an Angel Command Dragon in the battle zone, you may cast this spell for no cost. Your opponent can't cast spells until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. Invasion - Water creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your water creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a creature from your hand under this creature. If you do, draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Your opponent may put any number of non-evolution creatures from their hand into the battle zone. Then you may summon a creature from your hand that costs more than your opponents creature your opponent put into the battle zone that has the highest cost.(If your opponent put no creatures into the battle zone, you may summon any creature for no cost)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} Choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. If you have 2 or more creatures that have ??? or The Answer in their race in the battle zone, return all your opponent's creatures to their owners' hands instead.

card.name: Push The Eye, Demon Dragon King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, if your number of creatures is greater than or equal to your number of shields, destroy one of your opponent's untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent chooses and discards 2 cards from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, discard your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value:
Evolution - Put on one of your fire creatures.
Invasion - Fire creature that costs 5 or more (When one of your CONDITIONS attack, you may put this creature from your hand onto it)
​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent´s creature that has power 5000 or less. If you have 3 or more cards under this creature, destroy any number of your opponent´s creatures that have power 8000 or less instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put up to 2 of your shields into your hand. You can't use the 'shield trigger' ability of those shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ Shield trigger(When this Card Type is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may use it for no cost) Put one of your seals into your graveyard. Choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts a seal on that creature. (When you seal a card, put the top card of your deck on that card face down. Whenever a Command is put into the battle zone, its owner puts a seal from one of his cards that has the same civilization as that Command into his graveyard. While a creature is sealed, both players ignore that creature)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into their mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose any number of your shields and put them into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Invasion - Light creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your light creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your light creatures. Whenever one of your light creatures is attacked or blocked, you may put this creature on top of it. ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if your number of creatures is greater to or equal than your number of shields, your creatures win all battles until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: If you have a water creature in the battle zone, this creature gets 'shield trigger'. Evolution - Put on one of your water creatures. ​ {BLOCKER} Revolution 2 - When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, you may draw 3 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 2 cards. Then your opponent draws a card. Your water spells cost 2 less to cast. They can't cost 0 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Ultra Saver: Evolution creature(When one of your evolution creatures would leave the battle zone, you may destroy this creature instead) Mana Arms 3 - When this creature is destroyed, if you have 3 or more water cards in your mana zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may take a spell from among them, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. Charger(After you cast this spell, put it into your mana zone instead of your graveyard)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your darkness creatures. Invasion - Darkness creature that costs 3 or more(When one of your darkness creatures that costs 3 or more attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

property.value: If your number of creatures is greater to or equal than your number of shields, you may summon this creature from your graveyard.
